00037 #include "egs_projectors.h"
00038 #include "egs_functions.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_Projector::EGS_Projector(const EGS_Vector &A, const string &Type) :
00041     a(A), xo(EGS_Vector()), d(0), type(Type) {
00042     norm = a.length(); a.normalize();
00043     if( a.x*a.x + a.y*a.y > 0 ) {
00044         v1 = EGS_Vector(-a.y,a.x,0); v1.normalize();
00045     }
00046     else v1 = EGS_Vector(1,0,0);
00047     v2 = a%v1;
00048 }
00049 
00050 EGS_Projector::EGS_Projector(const EGS_Vector &x1, const EGS_Vector &x2,
00051                 const EGS_Vector &x3, const string &T) : type(T) {
00052     v1 = x2-x1; v2 = x3-x1; a = v1%v2; xo = x1;
00053     if( a.length2() < 1e-10 ) egsFatal("EGS_Projector::EGS_Projector: "
00054            " the vectors are co-linear\n");
00055     a.normalize(); norm = 1;
00056     v1.normalize(); v2 = a%v1; d = a*x1;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void EGS_Projector::printInfo() const {
00060     egsInformation(" normal = (%g,%g,%g)\n",a.x,a.y,a.z);
00061 };
